Enchantment 8

Hall of Statues

MA Agartha

Ritual
E5

effect number [effect_number]: 1
damage [damage]: 1496

Summon Units:#1496 Sentinel x 20+ [4/lvl]
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok])
Some halls underneath the earth contains entire rows of the sacred status of the pale ones from before. With this ritual a large group of statues are given life. The amount of statues brought to life are highly dependent on the skill of mage performing the ritual.
